description:
DreamTeam describes itself as an infrastructure platform for eSports that aims to help millions of gamers find teammates, improve skills, manage teams, and earn money. Its goal is to help the average gamer build, grow, manage, and monetize a team in the same way that professional eSports teams do. By lowering the barrier to entry, DreamTeam intends to bring mass adoption to eSports. The project's vision is to build the biggest all-in-one platform for eSports.

name: DreamTeam Token
